text: Yadi kona kora'ana emana hata, yara sahayye pahara calamana haya athaba yamina khandita haya athaba mrtara katha bale, tabe ki hata? Baram saba kaja to allahara hate. Imanadarara ki e byapare niscita naya ye, yadi allaha ca'itena, tabe saba manusake satpathe paricalita karatena? Kapherara tadera krtakarmera karane saba samaya aghata pete thakabe athaba tadera grhera nikatabarti sthane aghata neme asabe, ye, paryanta allahara oyada na ase. Niscaya allaha oyadara khelapha karena na.
